Class NewtonRaphsonApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • NewtonRaphsonApp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class NewtonRaphsonApp
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener
    This class acts as the runner and allows the user to enter equation information.
    Version:
    2.1
    Author:
    Horatiu Lazu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        private boolean verifyCommandValidity(boolean isFinal)
        This method calculates the validity of a command.
        Parameters:
        isFinal - boolean This determines if it is the final computation (in which case different things need to be verified, for example appropriate closing brackets)

        boolean This determines if it is valid.
